001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before">array:insert-before</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class ArrayInsertBefore {
031  @NonNull
032  private static final String NAME = "insert-before";
033  // CPD-OFF
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextIndependent()
040      .focusIndependent()
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("array")
043          .type(IArrayItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .argument(IArgument.builder()
047          .name("position")
048          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
049          .one()
050          .build())
051      .argument(IArgument.builder()
052          .name("member")
053          .type(IItem.class)
054          .zeroOrMore()
055          .build())
056      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
057      .returnOne()
058      .functionHandler(ArrayInsertBefore::execute)
059      .build();
060  // CPD-ON
061
062  private ArrayInsertBefore() {
063    // disable construction
064  }
065
066  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
067  @NonNull
068  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
069      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
070      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
071      IItem focus) {
072    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
073        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
074    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
075    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") T member = (T) ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2)).toCollectionValue();
076
077    return ISequence.of(insertBefore(array, position, member));
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
082   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before">array:insert-before</a>.
083   *
084   * @param <T>
085   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
086   * @param array
087   *          the target Metapath array
088   * @param positionItem
089   *          the integer position of the item to insert before
090   * @param member
091   *          the Metapath item to insert into the identified array
092   * @return a new array containing the modification
093   * @throws ArrayException
094   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> insertBefore(
098      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
099      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem,
100      @NonNull T member) {
101    return insertBefore(array, positionItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), member);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
106   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before">array:insert-before</a>.
107   *
108   * @param <T>
109   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
110   * @param array
111   *          the target Metapath array
112   * @param position
113   *          the integer position of the item to insert before
114   * @param member
115   *          the Metapath item to insert into the identified array
116   * @return a new array containing the modification
117   * @throws ArrayException
118   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
119   */
120  @NonNull
121  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> insertBefore(
122      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
123      int position,
124      @NonNull T member) {
125    return ArrayJoin.join(ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
126        ArraySubarray.subarray(array, 1, position - 1),
127        IArrayItem.of(member),
128        ArraySubarray.subarray(array, position))));
129  }
130}
